body_html: The seq2seq module does not use the dynamic unrolling functions. We need a new module that uses them, and it will probably have a new API and the current seq2seq will be deprecated. That's why we're not documenting it -- because we're not committing to this API and it might go away.
body_text: The seq2seq module does not use the dynamic unrolling functions. We need a new module that uses them, and it will probably have a new API and the current seq2seq will be deprecated. That's why we're not documenting it -- because we're not committing to this API and it might go away.
body: The seq2seq module does not use the dynamic unrolling functions. We need a new module that uses them, and it will probably have a new API and the current seq2seq will be deprecated. That's why we're not documenting it -- because we're not committing to this API and it might go away.
